title: Over 20,000 vulnerable Microsoft Exchange servers exposed to attacks
description: Tens of thousands of Microsoft Exchange email servers in Europe, the U.S., and Asia exposed on the public internet are vulnerable to remote code execution flaws. [...]

title: Google Chrome's new cache change could boost performance
description: Google is introducing a significant change to Chrome's Back/Forward Cache (BFCache) behavior, allowing web pages to be stored in the cache, even if a webmaster specifies not to store a page in the browser's cache. [...]

title: US Health Dept urges hospitals to patch critical Citrix Bleed bug
description: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) warned hospitals this week to patch the critical 'Citrix Bleed' Netscaler vulnerability actively exploited in attacks. [...]
